meanings.definition: Resembling whey in appearance or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The pale, watery soup had a wheylike texture.
meanings.sent2: The liquid had a wheylike color, making it hard to distinguish from actual whey.
meanings.sent3: The wheylike puddle on the floor looked like a spilled milkshake.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was so smooth, it felt wheylike to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The wheylike clouds floated lazily across the sky, resembling a giant milk spill.

meanings.sent1: The cheese had a wheylike taste, reminding me of dairy farms.
meanings.sent2: The wheylike smell of the protein shake filled the room.
meanings.sent3: His wheylike behavior towards the cows made him the favorite farmer.
meanings.sent4: The wheylike consistency of the smoothie made it easy to drink.
meanings.sent5: The wheylike softness of the pillow made it perfect for a good night's sleep.
